backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor providing no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping app features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text JSON containing prewritten summaries of frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining light and dark OKLCH theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags and script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, and standalone display mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the calculator page in a full-height layout.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Calcula: Renders the calculator expression input and result/error area using styled components.
Scientific keypad grid with buttons that emit click events and themed variants.
Main calculator page wiring display, keypad, history, and steps panels with UI layout.
frontend/src/features/calculator/useCalc: Hook managing calculator state, building tokens/AST, evaluating expressions, and returning results and steps.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryPan: Scrollable UI panel showing saved calculation history with a clear button.
frontend/src/features/history/useLocalHi: Hook storing calculation history in localStorage and providing load, add, and clear functions.
frontend/src/features/steps/StepsPanel.t: Accordion panel that displays generated step-by-step solution text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub hook that returns no queries since the app performs all logic locally.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/calc/evaluate.ts: Evaluates an AST representing a mathematical expression, supporting operators, constants, functions, and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/calc/math.ts: Implements factorial with bounds and validation for integer, non-negative inputs.
frontend/src/lib/calc/parse.ts: Parses a token list into an AST using recursive descent, handling precedence, unary operators, functions, and errors.
frontend/src/lib/calc/stepSolver.ts: Generates human-readable step-by-step explanations of tokenization, AST structure, evaluation order, and the final result.
frontend/src/lib/calc/tokenize.ts: Converts a math expression string into tokens, handling numbers, functions, constants, operators, and normalization of symbols.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, OKLCH-based theme extensions, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, goals, architectural notes, and a list of required features for a mobile-friendly scientific calculator web app with local history and a rule-based solver.
